attributes.additional_details:
It's the right thing to do.

It will be worse in 10 years time when 
China are stronger and invade Taiwan.

Stand up now and stop appeasement to aggressor nations before it is too late.
attributes.background: Sanction UK leading Europe and the US in providing Air support to Ukraine

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We currently have the below petition open on a similar topic which you might like to sign.
Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314
